text: Roger Federer was the defending champion, but was defeated by Juan Martín del Potro in the final, 6–3, 6–7(5), 6–4, 6–7(4), 2–6. ==Seeds== # Roger Federer (Final, lost to Juan Martín del Potro) # Andy Murray (Fourth Round, lost to Marin Čilić) # Rafael Nadal (Semifinals, lost to Juan Martín del Potro) # Novak Djokovic (Semifinals, lost to Roger Federer) # Andy Roddick (Third Round, lost to John Isner) # Juan Martín del Potro (Champion) # Jo-Wilfried Tsonga (Fourth Round, lost to Fernando González) # Nikolay Davydenko (Fourth Round, retired - hip injury - against Robin Söderling) # Gilles Simon (Third Round, retired - knee injury - against Juan Carlos Ferrero) # Fernando Verdasco (Quarterfinals, lost to Novak Djokovic) # Fernando González (Quarterfinals, lost to Rafael Nadal) # Robin Söderling (Quarterfinals, lost to Roger Federer) # Gaël Monfils (Fourth Round, lost to Rafael Nadal) # Tommy Robredo (Fourth Round, lost to Roger Federer) # Radek Štěpánek (Fourth Round, lost to Novak Djokovic) # Marin Čilić (Quarterfinals, lost to Juan Martín del Potro) 17.
